text: viśvāsa koṭa yahakam kaḷavun kerehi ovun taman va (pāpayen) ārakṣā koṭa viśvāsa koṭa yahakam kara pasuva taman va (tahanam kaḷa dæyin) ārakṣā koṭa viśvāsa koṭa pasuva taman ārakṣā koṭa dæhæmi kaṭayutu kaḷa viṭa (tahanam kaḷa dǣ hi) ovun bhukti vin̆dī dǣ sambandhayen ovunaṭa varadak næta. tavada allāh dæhæmi kaṭayutu karannan va priya karayi
